it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client

Class ClientView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer.RemoteObservable<ViewEvent>
      • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client.ClientView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteView, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>, Remote

    public class ClientView
extends RemoteObservable<ViewEvent>
implements RemoteView
    A class representing the view implemented by a client, extending the RemoteObservable abstract class to notify listeners about a ViewEvent generated by the user.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Farinelli, Alessandro Fulgini

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(ViewEvent event)
        Sends the given event to all subscribed observers (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them). If calling update() throws an IOException, the exception is simply ignored.
        Overrides:
        notifyObservers in class RemoteObservable<ViewEvent>
        Parameters:
        event - event to be sent to observers
